thread.title: Rochelle Ross Mays
thread.title_full: DriveTime reviewed by Rochelle Ross Mays

author: Rochelle Ross Mays
title: Rochelle Ross Mays
text:
I want personally thank Ms. Tamar for going the extra mile. She treated me as through I had an appointment. Once she was done with the person in front of me. We just started right where we left off. Tamar did not mind me changing my mind, she explained every little detail about purchasing a car from Drive Time. She even followed me the Enterprise to return the car.
I hope you give that Young Lady A Raise.
